paragraph.heading: 1Project settings window
paragraph.paragraph: This is where global settings regarding your project are going to be made. In here you can specify:

list.item: The type of project you wish to generate

paragraph.paragraph:
The project window can be raised by clicking
/images/eiffelbuild/icons/icon_display_window_color.png on the
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/10_general_interface_description/20_main_toolbars.xml main toolbar , or by selecting Settings... from the Project menu.
The window is organized as three tabs:
All options are enabled and saved into the project settings file, 'project_settings.xml' as soon as the window is closed.
